May 19 , 2014 6:52 p.m. ( Bloomberg ) -- Credit Suisse AG pleaded guilty to helping Americans cheat on their taxes , making it the first bank in more than a decade to admit to a crime in a U.S. courtroom and marking the end of a three - year probe of the Swiss firm .
